properties.entry: SELECT * FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEM_NO = Q.Q_MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND Q_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY Q_DATE DESC

INSERT INTO QNA ( Q_NO, Q_TITLE, Q_CONTENT, Q_DATE, Q_STATUS, Q_GRADE, Q_CATEGORY, CL_NO, Q_MEM_NO, A_TITLE, A_CONTENT, A_DATE, A_MEM_NO, A_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_QANO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SYSDATE, 'Y', '2', ?, NULL, ?, NULL, NULL, NULL, 0, 'N' )
SELECT * FROM QNA WHERE Q_NO =? AND Q_STATUS = 'Y'
